EmailTemplate.description: This template is used to send email for Case creation for customer
EmailTemplate.name: Case Creation Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your case is Submitted Successfully with Case # :{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for reaching out to support@autorabit.com. We regret the inconvenience caused to you.
You can track the status of your case with Case # :{!Case.CaseNumber} .
We are looking into your issue and be rest assured that we will be getting back to you with a solution to fix the issue.
Note: We might need to get back to you to schedule a call or a WebEx session to understand more about the issue and provide a solution. Do not forget to Mention "Issue/Problem" in the Subject line.
Thanks AutoRABIT Support support@autorabit.com.
